Accounting_WorktagObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.
For types that require a parent reference, contains a unique identifier for an instance of a parent object.
For types that require a parent reference, the unique identifier type of a parent object.

Accounting_WorktagObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Award_Proposal_Credits_Data.description: The required and optional worktags for the allocation.
The percentage for the award proposal credit allocation.

Award_Proposal_Data.description: Contains the award proposal credit allocation information for an award proposal.

validation.validation: The allocated award credits must add to 100% for each definition.

Award_Proposal_Attachment_Data.description: Text attribute identifying Content Type of the Attachment.
Text attribute identifying Filename of the Attachment.
Text attribute identifying Encoding of the Attachment.
Boolean attribute identifying whether the Attachment is compressed.

Award_Attachment_CategoryObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

Award_Attachment_CategoryObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

Award_Attachment_CategoryObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Award_Proposal_Data.description: Encapsulating element containing all Business Document Attachment data.

validation.validation: Award Attachment Category marked as Inactive cannot be added to the award.
If a file name is specified for a Financial Attachment, File Content and Content Type are required.
Exactly one Award Proposal Line must be marked as primary.
Please add at least one Award Proposal line.
The Proposal Total (Sum of the Award Proposal Cost Share Total and Sponsor Total) and the Entered Line Amount must be equal to submit the Award Proposal.
An active award proposal submission type must be specified.
validation.description: An active award proposal submission type must be specified.

validation.validation: Award Proposal Submission Type is required.  Provide an active submission type.
validation.description: Award Proposal Submission Type is required.  Provide an active submission type.

validation.validation: Award Proposal Lifecycle Status is required. Provide an active lifecycle status.
validation.description: Award Proposal Lifecycle Status is required. Provide an active lifecycle status.

validation.validation: An active award proposal lifecycle status must be specified.
validation.description: An active award proposal lifecycle status must be specified.

validation.validation: Award Proposal Sponsor Total must equal the sum of Award Proposal Sponsor Direct Cost and Sponsor Facilities and Administration.
validation.description: Award Proposal Sponsor Total must equal the sum of Award Proposal Sponsor Direct Cost and Sponsor Facilities and Administration.

validation.validation: Enter no more than 12 Months or 100% Cost Share Rate for a worker's budget period.
